entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50
